description: Before arriving on the stage here, I visited an exhibition of stalls set up by Self-Help Groups comprising women from all eight North Eastern States. The artefacts and products displayed in this exh
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Euphoric atmosphere at the public meeting in Shillong. Inaugurated key infrastructure that will benefit Northeast. 

Visited Self Help Group stalls set up by women from Northeast states. Artefacts & products displayed are impressive. 

Football stadium, whose foundation stone was laid will give a boost to sporting infrastructure in Meghalaya, where football is very popular.

Highlighted how a focus on cleanliness will give an impetus to tourism in the Northeast &  create several economic opportunities for people.

A special day for Northeast…Broad Gauge Passenger Trains will connect Manipur & Mizoram. Kamakhya & Vaishno Devi will be directly connected.
